summary: Yitzhak Rabin  was an Israeli politician and general.
full_text: Yigal Amir  is an Israeli religious extremist who assassinated Prime Minister of Israel Yitzhak Rabin. The assassination took place on November 4, 1995 at the conclusion of a rally in Tel Aviv. Amir is serving a life sentence for murder plus six years for injuring Rabin's bodyguard, Yoram Rubin, under aggravating circumstances. He was later sentenced to an additional 8 years for conspiracy to murder.
title: Yigal Amir
